info.title: odmObject grinder

grinder.description: This odmObject describes the attributes associated with a grinder. The Property "coarseness" of the grounds is an integer. The higher the value, the less coarse. The Property "remaining" is a percentage that represents the unground material left.
grinder.name: Grinder

remaining.description: The percentage of unground material left.
remaining.name: remaining percentage
